reviews.review_msg: the prof himself is entertaining and he cares about his students and our learning, but the TA is such a tough grader and bascom is totally fine with their grading style. like yeah you'll enjoy the class and have some fun but the bad grade kinda turns things around. but tbh still a good class, just dont be dumb like me
Bascom is a great prof. He cares abou students. He is very approachable and we can learn a lot from him. He also has a good sense of humour. I would take his class again.
